p:
The worldwide energy demand is at an all-time high and will continue to rise further due to global population growth and ever increasing industrialisation
1 . According to the International Energy Outlook 2017
2 , the worldwide energy consumption is expected to rise by 28% between 2015 and 2040, which is equivalent to 4,72 × 10 10 MWh. This increase in energy consumption leads to several challenges, the most prominent being the impact of energy production on the world climate and the dwindling reserves of fossil fuels
3 . Therefore, the development of energy-saving technologies is more important than ever.
